channel.title: CVE Feed for Fuji Xerox Co.,Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fuji Xerox Co.,Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-10848|2024-08-05T17:50:12.701Z -- fuji%20xerox%20co.%2Cltd. -- installer%20for%20docuworks
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Installers for DocuWorks 8.0.7 and earlier and DocuWorks Viewer Light published in Jul 2017 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2017-10850|2024-08-05T17:50:12.585Z -- fuji%20xerox%20co.%2Cltd. -- installer%20of%20art%20ex%20driver%20for%20apeosport-vi%20c7771%2Fc6671%2Fc5571%2Fc4471%2Fc3371%2Fc2271
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Installers of ART EX Driver for ApeosPort-VI C7771/C6671/C5571/C4471/C3371/C2271, DocuCentre-VI C7771/C6671/C5571/C4471/C3371/C2271 (Timestamp of code signing is before 12 Apr 2017 02:04 UTC.), PostScript? Driver + Additional Feature Plug-in + PPD File for ApeosPort-VI C7771/C6671/C5571/C4471/C3371/C2271, DocuCentre-VI C7771/C6671/C5571/C4471/C3371/C2271 (Timestamp of code signing is before 12 Apr 2017 02:10 UTC.), XPS Print Driver for ApeosPort-VI C7771/C6671/C5571/C4471/C3371/C2271, DocuCentre-VI C7771/C6671/C5571/C4471/C3371/C2271 (Timestamp of code signing is before 3 Nov 2017 23:48 UTC.), ART EX Direct FAX Driver for ApeosPort-VI C7771/C6671/C5571/C4471/C3371/C2271, DocuCentre-VI C7771/C6671/C5571/C4471/C3371/C2271 (Timestamp of code signing is before 26 May 2017 07:44 UTC.), Setting Restore Tool for ApeosPort-VI C7771/C6671/C5571/C4471/C3371/C2271, DocuCentre-VI C7771/C6671/C5571/C4471/C3371/C2271 (Timestamp of code signing is before 25 Aug 2015 08:51 UTC.) allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2017-10849|2024-08-05T17:50:12.633Z -- fuji%20xerox%20co.%2Cltd. -- self-extracting%20document%20generated%20by%20docuworks
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Self-extracting document generated by DocuWorks 8.0.7 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2017-10851|2024-08-05T17:50:12.584Z -- fuji%20xerox%20co.%2Cltd. -- installer%20for%20contentsbridge%20utility%20for%20windows
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in Installer for ContentsBridge Utility for Windows 7.4.0 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
